title: Ryan The Spy and: The Treasure Hunter's Secret: A Growth Mindset Series
description: Ryan The Spy’s next mission takes him on an exciting journey following the world’s best treasure hunter, Captain James. On this pirate adventure, Ryan and spy friend Cassie will uncover The Treasure Hunter's Secret and learn you must believe to succeed. Readers will see that with unwavering certainty and action, giant goals are possible - even when others doubt you. Ryan The Spy is a children’s series with purpose. Each easily understandable story teaches children a new and valuable life lesson that adults often wish they had learned earlier in life. A must have for parents and teachers who want an extraordinary life for their children.
author: Jason Rago
